attributes.action: Index link the disgusting pay awards Ministers and MPs keep giving themselves, to the pitiful pay awards they give to nurses and other low-paid health-service workers.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Instead of the "pigs at a trough" awards Ministers and MPs get, through having their salaries linked to grossly underworked senior-grade civil servants, the salaries of politicians, should, instead be linked to those of nurses, etc. So that the regular conniving to fiddle the salaries paid to nurses, down to the smallest amount possible, is finally done away with.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
